name: Dash Building Entry Alert Button
tagline: Listens for Dash presses and enables responding with custom actions, such as posting your team's Slack channel.
body:
### About Dash Building Entry Alert Button
Dash Building Entry Alert Button notifies your team when the building is open. When Amazon Dash Button is pressed, it automatically posts to your team's Slack channel. 

Here in Make School, instructors push the button in the morning. Then, students can check whether the building is open before they go out.

### Demo
[Demo video](https://youtu.be/czpxAmm8_ws)

![AmazonDashButton](https://github.com/MakeSchool/dash-listener/blob/master/AmazonDashButton.JPG?raw=true)
The button near the alarm system

![Slack](https://github.com/MakeSchool/dash-listener/blob/master/SlackPost.png?raw=true)
Slack channel after pushing the button
